name: Property used in manufacture of pulp and paper
text: All property in the State, both real and personal, actually and solely used or to be used, whether by the owner or lessee thereof, in connection with the manufacture of pulp and paper from bagasse fibre, shall be exempt from property taxes for a period of five years from the first day of January following commencement of construction of a plant or plants on the property for such purpose. [L 1955, c 220, §2; RL 1955, §128-20.3; HRS ; am L 1969, c 170, §14; am L 1975, c 157, §13]
